<xen:title>{xen:phrase bdsocialshare_add_another_account}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'tools/social-share/add-more/{$type}'}"> <xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:foreach loop="$accounts" key="$key" value="$account"> <xen:option name="accounts[{$key}][add]" selected="{$account.selected}"> {xen:if '{$account.label}', '{$account.label}: '}{$account.name}
<input type="hidden" name="accounts[{$key}][target_id]" value="{$account.target_id}" /> <input type="hidden" name="accounts[{$key}][name]" value="{$account.name}" /> </xen:option> </xen:foreach> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase save}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="token" value="{$token}" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase bdsocialshare_post_to_facebook} {xen:phrase bdsocialshare_post_to_twitter} {$typeText} {xen:phrase bdsocialshare_shared_accounts}

modification.description: Insert auto sharing (for thread) controls

listener.description: Extending XenForo_ControllerPublic_Register (execution order 9999 to run as late as possible)

phrases.phrase: Add-on upgrade required for {addOn} (oldest version supported: {versionId}).
No accounts could be found. Administrators must add a shared account before staff can use Staff Share.
When you get awarded a medal...
When you get awarded a trophy...
Connect to {network} to use this feature.
This will hide all share buttons across the site. You will not be able to choose to share contents.
No Facebook Groups found. You can try to authenticate again and reload this page to refresh the data, click here.
No Facebook Pages found under your Facebook account. You can try to authenticate again and reload this page to refresh the data, click here.
There has been some problem publishing your share recently. Click here to try again or dismiss.
Add account to shared accounts list and use them in the Auto Share feature. Shared accounts can also be used in Staff Share feature, allowing staff to publish to the site's Social Pages on demand.
The Staff Share has been published successfully.
Twitter Integration must be configured with a consumer key and secret pair before you can use this feature.
I have just been awarded the "{medal}" medal at {board_title}!
I have just been awarded the "{trophy_phrase}" trophy at {board_title}!
Enable this option to try to render social-network-friendly denied page for contents. List of supported contents: resource, thread.

Enable this option to off-load publishing shares to a background request. Doing this will improve user experience because members will not have to wait a few extra seconds when they choose to publish something to social sites. However, this will cause delay before the content get published (typically less than 10 seconds).
Facebook can read Open Graph metadata in web pages but occasionally the information is incorrect or missing. Enable this option to let the add-on send data directly itself.
If enabled, user will be able to setup auto-share for being awarded a medal.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user publishes new items.
Enable this option to remember last share button configuration: They will be automatically checked if user enabled the previous time; They will stay unchecked if user opted out before.

If configured, all resources will be shared automatically upon creation to the specified social network account(s). Independent of user choice to share to his/her own account. Related permission: "Resource gets auto-shared".
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user creates a new resource.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user creates a new resource update (not when editing a resource).
You can configure the button states if user hasn't connect to a social network. User will be prompted to connect after the failed share.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user uploads new photos.

If configured, all user statuses will be shared automatically to the specified social network account(s). Independent of user choice to share to his/her own account. Related permission: "Status gets auto-shared".
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user update a new profie status.

If configured, user threads will be shared automatically to the specified social network account(s). Independent of user choice to share to his/her own account. Each forum's configuration will override system's (to configure, go to Applications > Display Node Tree > Edit Forum > tab Forum Options). Related permission: "Thread gets auto-shared".
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user creates a new thread.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user replies to a thread (both quick reply and full feature interface).
If enabled, user will be able to setup auto-share for being awarded a trophy.
Enable this option to allow user to hide share buttons in Account > Preferences.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user uploads a new image.
If enabled, social share buttons will show up when user publish a new blog entry.

<xen:title>{xen:phrase bdsocialshare_staff_share}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link misc/staff-share}" class="xenForm formOverlay" method="POST">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="url_ctrl">{xen:phrase bdsocialshare_link}:</dt> <dd> <input id="url_ctrl" type="text" name="url" class="textCtrl" /> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase continue}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
